abstract: Lincoln Center for the Performing Arts announces plans to create its own hall of fame called Legends at Lincoln Center: The Performing Arts Hall of Fame; selection of 30 'founding legends' inducted to hall of fame listed.

headline.print_headline: Lincoln Center Creates a Hall of Fame and Starts With 30 ‘Founding Legends’
headline.main: Lincoln Center Will Create a Performing Arts Hall of Fame

keywords.value: Lincoln Center for the Performing Arts
keywords.name: organizations

snippet: The first class of honorees for the “Legends at Lincoln Center” initiative will be chosen next month, with an induction ceremony planned for June.
lead_paragraph: The first class of honorees for the “Legends at Lincoln Center” initiative will be chosen next month, with an induction ceremony planned for June.
